title: Draft pick bug
body:
I joined a draft pick. Everything went normal until our jungler tried to lock in. The timer was stuck at 0. My teammates did not have this error only me. Im kinda afraid to hop into another queue. Ill try again now wish me luck! Ill provide a link to a video supporting this, sorry for the excessive cursing. Sorry i wasn't fast enough to pull out the cam though. This time ill keep it open to try to catch it again if it happens.
This happend in latest patch.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IvbOFO6Bhwo&feature=youtu.be
Edit: I got into a game now! Such a shame i had to wait 5 minutes for the ban to get over! Lets hope that its not gonna happen again to anyone :D

replies.body:
Freezes during champ select where the timer hits 0 but actions do not resume are usually caused by your client disconnecting from the matchmaking service. To prevent this from happening in the future, I definitely recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you have any questions.
